library(phyloseq)
library(ape)
counts<-read.table("counts.txt")
variables<-read.table("sample_data.txt")
taxa<-read.table("taxa.txt")
tree<-read.tree(tree.nwk")

               sample_data(variables), 
               tax_table(taxa),phy_tree(tree))
saveRDS(ps,file="ps.rds")
